item.title: Making an interface
item.dc:creator: @Trade_Me Trade Me
item.description:
@Trade_Me wrote:

I Had added this in RSInterface.java
And yes i have the interface pictures in that location…
And for some reason Thessalia’s Makeovers (legs) interface pops up whenever I do ::interface 5000 in-game…
Before you ask…
Have I tried a different Interface number?
Yes, I have…

public static void LoginInterface(RSFont[] tda) { //Login Interface on start-up
        RSInterface tab = addTabInterface(5000);
		addSprite(5001, 0, "Interfaces/LoginInterface/Background");
		addHoverButton(5002, "Interfaces/LoginInterface/Play", 0, 371, 47, "Start Playing", -1, 5003, 1);
        addHoveredButton(5003, "Interfaces/LoginInterface/Play", 12, 371, 47, 5004);
		 tab.totalChildren(2);
		 tab.child(0,5001, 29, 20);
		 tab.child(0,5002, 500, 500);
}

Read full topic
